value.halfverse: to the LORD I make loud supplication.
value.verse: I cry to the LORD with my voice; *
I pour out my complaint before him *
value.halfverse: and tell him all my trouble.

value.verse: When my spirit languishes within me, you know my path; *
value.halfverse: in the way wherein I walk they have hidden a trap for me.

value.verse: I look to my right hand and find no one who knows me; *
value.halfverse: I have no place to flee to, and no one cares for me.

value.verse: I cry out to you, O LORD; *
value.halfverse:
I say, “You are my refuge,
 my portion in the land of the living.”

value.verse: Listen to my cry for help, for I have been brought very low; *
value.halfverse:
save me from those who pursue me,
 for they are too strong for me.

when you have dealt bountifully with me,
 the righteous will gather around me.
value.verse: Bring me out of prison, that I may give thanks to your Name; *
